1.0.0.name: wordpress/itunes-favorites-music-iphoneipad-apps
1.0.0.description:
Easily insert links to iTunes products within your blog posts and show your favorites in a sidebar widget. Formatting configuration allows you to choose if the icon for a product is displayed, if you want to use an affiliate ID, etc.

  1. Use the simple button in the editor to import a song/app/album/etc. from iTunes.
  2. The product will be added to your favorites. Favorites automatically appear in the widget. You can also manage your favorites and press a single button to insert a link to one of them from within your blog post.
  3. Change display options for the widget, or add an affiliate ID using the settings.
